items.sentence: Tom\'s gym teacher is Mary\'s basketball coach.
Tom\'s house is about the same size as Mary\'s.
What will happen if there\'s power failure now?
What\'s your favorite non-Google search engine?
Many of the students got bored and fell asleep.
I wrote her name down so I wouldn\'t forget it.
I\'d feel the same way if I were in your shoes.
I\'d like to ask Tom to answer a few questions.
I\'d like to put some things in the hotel safe.
Tom spends less time studying French than I do.
